title.rendered: AqualisBraemar adds salvage expert to growing London team

content.rendered:
We are delighted to announce that we have continued the process of strengthening our Marine team and service offerings to the P&I market with Jason Bennett joining the London team.

“Jason is a master mariner with 14 years sea-going experience gained on a broad mixture of vessel types, and we are delighted to have him join our growing team.” States Mark McGurran, Group Managing Director of Marine at AqualisBraemar. “Of specific value to our clients, Jason adds deep salvage experience to the team, further coming from a distinguished career at Titan Salvage and subsequently the merged company with Svitzer Salvage where he was Director of Projects for Ardent. This experience will be invaluable to our clients across the globe.”

“Alongside shipping, the salvage sector continues to experience a dynamic period of change. Commercial pressures continue to be exerted on participants, both service providers and clients.” Said Jason Bennett. “The nature and type of services continue to develop, together with the interactions of stakeholders, oversight and terms of engagement. AqualisBraemar is committed to providing the best and most robust consultancy in this market, and I am delighted I can be a part of this growing team.”

During his career Jason attended and led many vessel, casualty and salvage operations including the ERIKA sinking and subsequent deep oil recovery; the MSC NAPOLI casualty, participating in the initial Salvage Control Unit and later running the commercial team covering the project; and was integral to the mobilisation to and bid development for the COSTA CONCORDIA project.

AqualisBraemar is the world’s leading provider of marine surveying and consultancy services to the marine insurance and shipping communities.

For further information, please contact:

Investors and financial media

Kim Boman, CFO, AqualisBraemar ASA
Telephone: +47 959 63 912

Other media enquiries

Endre Johansen, Corporate Communications AS
Telephone: +47 41 61 06 05
Email: endre.johansen@corpcom.no

About AqualisBraemar ASA
AqualisBraemar ASA (OSE: Aqua) offers independent consultancy services to the offshore energy (oil & gas and renewables), shipping and insurance industries. The group employs specialist engineers, naval architects, master mariners, loss adjusters and technical consultants in 33 countries worldwide. AqualisBraemar ASA operates under three brands:
  • AqualisBraemar: a leading adjusting, marine and offshore consultancy to the energy, shipping and insurance industries
  • AqualisBraemar Yacht Services: a specialised marine consultant to the superyacht market
  • OWC: an independent consultancy to the offshore renewables sector
